page.title: 07Shopping Complex, Corby cont
page.content: Providing facilities which at present are only available in Northampton, Leicester and Peterborough, the new commercial development is likely to draw its users from a 15 to 20 mile radius of Corby. The plans have a provision for a new Corby rail link on the site, containing offices to help finance the scheme. Another link on the transport chain would be the provision of a link bus between the station and the town centre. The first jobs created will be in the development teams and the construction industry but it is hoped that there will also be a centre to provide training and real work experience for young people The development is being headed by Erostin Developments.
